item.title: Getting Started with Jekyll
item.description: What is Jekyll? Jekyll is a static site generator. It takes your content, renders Markdown and Liquid templates, and spits out a complete, static website ready to be served by Apache, Nginx or another web server. You can even host your site for free on GitHub Pages. what language is jekyll written in? Jekyll is written in Ruby. Installing ruby Windows Download and install Ruby+Devkit. Run ridk install to install the Devkit and install all components.
